medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was re-admitted from rehab with worsening abdominal distension following a recent surgery for splenic abscess and splenectomy. Previous discharge was after a stay complicated by septicemia likely due to C. difficile infection, pneumonia, and gram-positive bacteremia. The symptoms intensified after being discharged to rehabilitation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Splenic trauma s/p coiling c/b abscess and splenectomy, tracheostomy, COPD, CAD with stent placement, HTN, hypercholesterolemia, pneumonia.
